title: [1508521049] Smoky Pulled Pork with Chipotle Mayonnaise | Gordon Ramsay
description:
Complimented with a raw broccoli slaw and crushed cheesy potatoes, this is an incredible dish for parties. Slow cooking the pork keeps it juicy and helps it just melt in your mouth. Delicious.

Subscribe for weekly cooking videos. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's channels:

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword
